original: Fredriksson, Curt Artur, läroverksadjunkt, Halmstad, f. 26/2/95 i Sönd-rum. Hall. 1. G. 29 m. Märta Jepps-son. Barn: Margit f. 30, Rolf 31. — Stud:ex. i Halmstad 14, fitl. mag. i Lund 20, efterprövn. 29 o. 31. E. lär. v. Halmstads h. a. 1. 32-36, adj. där sed. 36.
translated: Fredriksson, Curt Artur, high school teacher, Halmstad, b. 26/2/95 in Sönd-rum, Halland. 1st Marriage: in 1929 to Märta Jeppsson. Children: Margit b. 1930, Rolf b. 1931. Education: high school graduation in Halmstad in 1914, master's degree in Lund in 1920, certification exams in 1929 and 1931. Started teaching as a substitute teacher in Halmstad in 1932, became a permanent teacher there since 1936.
